snippet: Reserves are to be built in the area of New York Harbor and in New England, in response to the oil shortages after Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Federal government will build its first gasoline storage reserves in the New York Harbor area and in New England; plan is in response to shortages suffered after Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Reserves are to be built in the area of New York Harbor and in New England, in response to the oil shortages after Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: U.S. to Store Gasoline for Crises in the Northeast
headline.print_headline: Spurred by Hurricane, U.S. Will Build Gasoline Reserves in Northeast
